PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-06522005-04-21,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAppointment of K. (RAI) SAHI of Mississauga, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, in the place of John Kim Bell, whose term has expired.
